Government

Mayor & City Council

Meeting Information

City Council meetings are the second and fourth Wednesday of each month at 6:00 pm at Council Chambers/Municipal Court at 2801 Ranch Road 1869 in Liberty Hill. Meetings can be viewed live online via a link that will be posted to the City's Facebook page just prior to the start of each meeting.

Meeting Agendas & Minutes
